string-array.name: stories_contents
string-array.item: We had an opportunity to get acquainted with the work of the enterprise by taking part to lectures and conducting excursions, as well as see the work of the employees and helping to them. Trainees are given the opportunity to study the work of the enterprise from the inside under the supervision of a curator, study and analyze documentation, and collect materials.
